All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractHtmlWriter
The abstract superclass for all HTML writers.
App
The main class of the application extending Application.
AppController
The controller for the main application window.
AppState
This class is used to store the state of the main FxUI app window.
Arguments
Represents the command line arguments for the profiler tool.
BindingUtils
This class contains utility methods for creating bindings.
Block
This class is used to store information about a code block.
BlockType
This enum is used to represent the type for a code block.
ClassType
This enum is used to represent the locality type for a class definition.
CodeInsert
This class is used to represent a code insertion.
CodePosition
A record class to store both the line and a character position in a unified way
CodeRegion
Class for a group of statements, inside a block, sharing one hit-count value.
CommandController
Controller for the run command preview dialog.
Component
Common supertype for all model classes representing a "component" of a java program.
ControlBreak
This class is used to represent a control flow break.
ControlBreak.Kind
The kind of control flow break.
DirectoryBeforeFileComparator
This comparator sorts files alphabetically with directories before files.
FileCollector
Collects files with a specific file extension from a directory and its subdirectories.
Instrumenter
This class is used to instrument the source files of a Java project.
IO
Helper class containing methods related to relative path finding and filesystem operations.
JavaCommandBuilder
Builder class for a java command line with arguments.
JavaFile
Model class representing a java file.
JavaProjectTree
This class is used to display the project directory as a tree view and interact with it.
JClass
This class is used to store information about a java class.
JCompilerCommandBuilder
Builder class for a javac command line with arguments.
Launcher
Launcher class for the App.
Logger
This class is used to log the parsing process.
Main
Main class of the profiler tool.
Metadata
Helper class to represent the metadata of a java project.
Method
Model class representing a java method.
OS
Helper enum class for operating system dependent get actions.
Parser
 
ParserState
Companion class for the Parser, generated by the attributed grammar in JavaFile.atg.
Profiler
 
ProjectController
The controller for the project selection dialog.
RecursiveDirectoryWatcher
Is used to watch a directory and all its subdirectories for file creation and deletion events.
RecursiveDirectoryWatcher.FileEventListener
An interface for listeners that want to be informed about file creation and deletion events.
ReportClassIndexWriter
The writer class for the class index overview page.
ReportMethodIndexWriter
The writer class for the method index overview page of a java class.
ReportSourceWriter
The writer class for the annotated source code report file of a java file.
ReportUtil
A utility class for common report generation helper methods.
RunMode
The possible run modes of the tool.
Scanner
 
SystemUtils
This class contains utility methods for interacting with the operating system.
Terminal
A class enumerating all supported terminal applications.
Util
Provides utility methods for all modules to use.
Util
This class contains utility methods for the ParserState.
__Counter
This class is used to count the number of times a block of code is executed.
